title: Curly Swirly Font
content:
Hi, I came across this swirly curly looking font, unsure what its called.

Thank you.

comments.content: **[Elastic Wrath](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419203932/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=Elastic%20Wrath%20-%20Regular&fid=8c8bc54cd7fbe97999a0ebe0dd626aff&fsize=60&text=pin%20pan%20pon&fit=1)** by Jenny Barck [1997, Free for personal use]
